chapters.title: Chapter 50: Choosing Enemies
chapters.info: Lady Belevaere Osiellin, p. 741—Lady of Cairhien, presumably Amondrid's wife. She was a guest at Barthanes's party; Rand met her when he walked into the room where Thom Merrilin was entertaining. She and Amondrid are of middling power in Cairhien, and a likely road block to Elayne's ascension to the Sun Throne. See also Osiellin, Amondrid.
